original: rab 'byor / de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni /
translated: Subhūti, when those kinds of aspects of the Dharma are explained to others, taught, and perfectly shown,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste /
translated: that is called the gift of the supramundane Dharma.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, that is how

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te /
translated: bodhisattva great beings gather beings with the gift of material things and the gift of the Dharma.

original: rab 'byor / de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni /
translated: Subhūti, that is

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so ////
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so ////
translated: the amazing and marvelous Dharma of bodhisattva great beings.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya gya gcig pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya gya gcig pa //
translated: Volume Two Hundred and One

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, how

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na /
translated: do bodhisattva great beings gather beings with pleasant speech?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings gather beings with the six perfections.

original: 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson @38b 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson @38b 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: They gather beings with the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom. With those six perfections, bodhisattva great beings gather beings with sweet talk.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de /
translated: It is because all wholesome dharmas are included in those six perfections.

original: rab 'byor; de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor; de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, that is how

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do //🔽rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do // rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings gather beings by means of pleasant speech?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings gather beings by means of beneficial action?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do //
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings gather beings by means of beneficial action with those six perfections.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de /
analyzed: 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de /
translated: Because all wholesome dharmas are included in those six perfections.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, in that way

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do //🔽rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do // rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
translated: bodhisattva great beings gather beings by means of beneficial action.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings gather beings by means of consistent behavior?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do //
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings gather beings with the same aim through the six perfections.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di @39a *// ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de /
analyzed: 'di @39a *// ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de /
translated: Because all wholesome dharmas are included in those six perfections.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, that is how

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do //
translated: bodhisattva great beings gather beings with the same aim.

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos so //
translated: Subhūti, this is the marvelous and wonderful Dharma of bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du 'doms shing 'di skad ston to //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du 'doms shing 'di skad ston to //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom instruct and teach other bodhisattva great beings, they instruct and teach them like this:

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‘Son of a good family!

original: khyed tshur sheg /
analyzed: khyed tshur sheg /
translated: Come here!

original: yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig /
analyzed: yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig /
translated: You should be skilled in the accomplishment of letters.

original: yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig /
analyzed: yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig /
translated: You should be skilled in one letter.

original: yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig /
analyzed: yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig /
translated: You should be skilled in two letters up to forty-two letters.

original: yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /
analyzed: yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /
translated: You should know the nature of the purification of one letter.

original: yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /
analyzed: yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /
translated: You should know the nature of the purification of two letters.

original: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /
analyzed: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /
translated: You should know the nature of the purification of up to forty-two letters.

original: yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig /
analyzed: yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig /
translated: You should meditate on the inclusion of forty-two letters in one letter.

original: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces ston to //
analyzed: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces ston to //
translated: You should meditate on the inclusion of one letter in forty-two letters.”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @39b chen po de'ang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @39b chen po de'ang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin /
translated: Subhūti, that bodhisattva mahāsattva is skilled in one letter,

original: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin /
translated: up to skilled in forty-two letters.

original: yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgom pa la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgom pa la mkhas pa yin /
translated: They are skilled in meditating on the forty-two letters as being included in a single letter.

original: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te /
analyzed: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te /
translated: They are skilled in meditating on a single letter as being included in the forty-two letters.

original: de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na /
analyzed: de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na /
translated: When they are skilled in the accomplishment of letters in this way,

original: la la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no //
analyzed: la la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no //
translated: they are skilled in the accomplishment of the absence of letters.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
translated: The Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha

original: chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te /
analyzed: chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te /
translated: is skilled in the Dharma and skilled in letters.

original: de la chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang rab 'byor /
analyzed: de la chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang rab 'byor /
translated: With that skill in the Dharma and skill in letters, he teaches the Dharma of the absence of letters with many letters.

original: chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang 'bral ba'ang ma yin te /
analyzed: chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang 'bral ba'ang ma yin te /
translated: Subhūti, that Dharma is not separate from the aspect of letters.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te /
translated: Subhūti, this is also a Dharma that is wondrous and marvelous for bodhisattva great beings,

original: gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no //
analyzed: gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no //
translated: which is not shared in common with all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste /

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /
translated: How do they practice the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, and the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment?

original: stong pa nyid bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /
translated: How do they practice the forty-two emptinesses, the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signlessness meditative stabilization, the wishlessness meditative stabilization, and the eight deliverances?

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
translated: the nine serial absorptions, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: sems can mi dmigs pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: “Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: “Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the applications of mindfulness are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas yang dag par spong ba dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas yang dag par spong ba dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: “Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the right efforts are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: “Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the legs of miraculous power are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas dbang po lnga dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas dbang po lnga dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: “Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the five faculties are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas stobs lnga dmigs su ma mchis so //🔽sems can mi @43a *//
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas stobs lnga dmigs su ma mchis so // sems can mi @43a *//
translated: “Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the five powers are non-apprehensible.

original: dmigs pas byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: dmigs pas byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: “Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the seven parts of awakening are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the noble eightfold path is non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the noble truths are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas bsam gtan dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas bsam gtan dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the meditative stabilities are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas tshad med pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas tshad med pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the immeasurable aspirations are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the formless absorptions are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the eight deliverances are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, emptiness and signlessness are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas smon pa med pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas smon pa med pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, aspirationlessness is non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas mngon par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas mngon par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the superknowledges are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas ting nge 'dzin dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas ting nge 'dzin dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, meditative stabilization is non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas gzungs kyi sgo dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas gzungs kyi sgo dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the dhāraṇī gateways are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the ten powers of the tathāgatas are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi @43b dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi @43b dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the four fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the four detailed and thorough knowledges are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas byams pa chen po dmigs su ma mchis so; ;sems can mi dmigs pas snying rje chen po dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas byams pa chen po dmigs su ma mchis so; ;sems can mi dmigs pas snying rje chen po dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, great love is non-apprehensible. Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, great compassion is non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Since sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the fruit of entering the stream is non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: because sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the fruit of once-returner is non-apprehensible,

original: sems can mi dmigs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: because sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the fruit of non-returner is non-apprehensible,

original: sems can mi dmigs pas dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: because sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the state of a worthy one is non-apprehensible,

original: sems can mi dmigs pas rang byang chub dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas rang byang chub dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: because sentient beings are non-apprehensible, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is non-apprehensible,

original: sems can mi dmigs pas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: because sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the knowledge of path aspects is non-apprehensible,🔽and because sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the knowledge of all aspects is non-apprehensible.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so; ;sems can mi dmigs pas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so; ;sems can mi dmigs pas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Because sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the thirty-two major marks of a great person are non-apprehensible,

original: sems can mi dmigs pas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: and because sentient beings are non-apprehensible, the eighty minor marks are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can dmigs su ma mchis pa la ni /
analyzed: sems can dmigs su ma mchis pa la ni /
translated: In the non-apprehension of sentient beings

analyzed: sems can ma mchis so //

analyzed: gzugs ma mchis so //

analyzed: tshor ba ma mchis so //

analyzed: 'du shes ma mchis so //

analyzed: yid ma mchis so //

analyzed: gzugs ma mchis so //

analyzed: chos ma mchis so //

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so //

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so //
translated: there is no feeling conditioned by contact that is the coming together of ear,🔽there is no feeling conditioned by contact that is the coming together of nose,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so //
translated: there is no feeling conditioned by contact that is the coming together of tongue,

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so //

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so //
translated: there is no feeling conditioned by contact that is the coming together of mind,

analyzed: sa'i khams ma mchis so //
translated: there is no earth element,

analyzed: chu'i khams ma mchis so //

analyzed: me'i khams ma mchis so //
translated: there is no fire element,

analyzed: rlung gi khams ma mchis so //
translated: there is no wind element,

analyzed: nam mkha'i @44b khams ma mchis so //
translated: there is no space element,

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so //
translated: there is no consciousness element,

analyzed: ma rig pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no ignorance,

analyzed: 'du byed ma mchis so //
translated: there are no volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no consciousness,

original: ming dang gzugs ma mchis so; ;skye mched drug ma mchis so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ma mchis so; ;skye mched drug ma mchis so //
translated: There are no six sense sources.

original: reg pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: reg pa ma mchis so //
translated: There is no contact.

original: tshor ba ma mchis so //🔽sred pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshor ba ma mchis so // sred pa ma mchis so //
translated: There is no feeling.🔽There is no craving.

original: lan pa ma mchis so //🔽srid pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lan pa ma mchis so // srid pa ma mchis so //
translated: There is no grasping.🔽There is no becoming.

original: skye ba ma mchis so //
analyzed: skye ba ma mchis so //
translated: There is no birth.

original: rga shi ma mchis so //
analyzed: rga shi ma mchis so //
translated: There is no old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
translated: There is no perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
translated: There is no perfection of discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
translated: There is no perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
translated: There is no perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //
translated: There is no perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so //🔽nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so //🔽phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so // nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so // phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no perfection of wisdom.🔽There is no emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of external phenomena.🔽There is no emptiness of both external and internal phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: There is no emptiness of great extent.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the emptiness of the ultimate is not found,🔽the emptiness of the conditioned is not found,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned is not found,🔽the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not found,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the emptiness of the beginningless and endless is not found,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the emptiness of nonrepudiation is not found,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence is not found,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena is not found,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics is not found,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //🔽dngos po @45a *//
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so // dngos po @45a *//
translated: the emptiness of nonapprehension is not found,

original: med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the emptiness of nonthings is not found,🔽the emptiness of essential nature is not found,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings is not found.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not found.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so //
translated: The right efforts are not found.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so //🔽dbang po lnga ma mchis so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so // dbang po lnga ma mchis so //
translated: the bases of supernatural powers do not exist,🔽the five powers do not exist,

original: stobs lnga ma mchis so //
analyzed: stobs lnga ma mchis so //
translated: the five forces do not exist,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ma mchis so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ma mchis so //
translated: the seven factors of awakening do not exist,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so //
translated: the noble eightfold path does not exist,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so //
translated: the noble truths do not exist,

original: bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so //
translated: the meditative stabilities do not exist,

original: tshad med pa rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ma mchis so //
translated: the immeasurables do not exist,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so //
translated: the formless absorptions do not exist,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so //
translated: the eight deliverances do not exist,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so //

original: stong pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ma mchis so //

analyzed: mtshan ma med pa ma mchis so //
translated: signlessness does not exist,

original: smon pa med pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: smon pa med pa ma mchis so //
translated: wishlessness does not exist,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so //
translated: the clairvoyances do not exist,

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so //
translated: the meditative stabilities do not exist,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways do not exist,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so //

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so //
translated: the four fearlessnesses do not exist,

original: so so yang dag par reg pa bzhi ma mchis so //🔽byams pa chen po ma mchis so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par reg pa bzhi ma mchis so // byams pa chen po ma mchis so //
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges do not exist,🔽great love does not exist,

original: snying rje chen po ma mchis so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma mchis so //
