original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha do not exist,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so //
translated: the result of stream enterer does not exist,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i @45b 'bras bu ma mchis so //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i @45b 'bras bu ma mchis so //
translated: the result of once-returner does not exist,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so //
translated: the result of non-returner does not exist,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the state of a worthy one does not exist,

original: rang byang chub ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang byang chub ma mchis so //
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening does not exist,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects does not exist,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma mchis so //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects does not exist,

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so //
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so //
translated: the thirty-two major marks of a great person do not exist,

original: dpe byed bzang po brgyad cu ma mchis so //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: dpe byed bzang po brgyad cu ma mchis so // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: and the eighty minor signs do not exist.🔽If one were to ask why, Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: it is because

original: de ni / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: It is as follows: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not apprehend even bodhisattvahood,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga las mchis /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga las mchis /
translated: so how could they possibly apprehend the dharmas on the side of awakening?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //🔽de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no // de de bzhin te /
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!🔽It is just as you have said.

original: ji skad du smras pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa bzhin no //
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, in that way, because beings are not apprehended, you should know that they are inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that they are outer emptiness.🔽You should know that they are inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that they are the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // don dam pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that they are great emptiness.🔽You should know that they are ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that they are conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽should be known as the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as the emptiness of what is not broken or discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽chos thams cad stong @46a *//
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // chos thams cad stong @46a *//
translated: should be known as the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽should be known as the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o; ;ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o; ;ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as the emptiness of non-observation.🔽should be known as the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽should be known as the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.🔽should be known as the emptiness of the aggregates.

original: khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as the emptiness of the elements.

original: skye mchod stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skye mchod stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as the emptiness of the sense sources.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that dependent origination is emptiness.🔽One should know that the four noble truths are emptiness.

original: bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the self is emptiness.

original: sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽srog stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // srog stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that sentient beings are emptiness.🔽One should know that a living being is emptiness.

original: 'gro ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽gso ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // gso ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that a person is emptiness.🔽One should know that a human being is emptiness.🔽One should know that a man is emptiness.

original: skyes bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o; ;gang zag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽shed can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o; ;gang zag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // shed can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that an individual is emptiness.🔽One should know that an agent is emptiness.🔽One should know that an experiencer is emptiness.

original: shed bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that an instigator is emptiness.🔽One should know that a creator is emptiness.

original: byed du 'jug pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed du 'jug pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that a knower is emptiness.🔽One should know that a seer is emptiness.🔽One should know that an hearer is emptiness.🔽One should know that one who smells is emptiness.🔽One should know that one who tastes is emptiness.🔽One should know that one who touches is emptiness.

original: kun nas slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: kun nas slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that one who cognizes is emptiness.

original: tshor ba bo stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba bo stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the one who feels is emptiness.

original: tshor bar byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor bar byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the one who causes feeling is emptiness.

original: shes pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the one who knows is emptiness.

original: mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the one who sees is emptiness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par @46b bya'o; ;yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par @46b bya'o; ;yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the applications of mindfulness are emptiness. One should know that the right efforts are emptiness.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽dbang po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // dbang po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the legs of miraculous power are emptiness.🔽One should know that the faculties are emptiness.

original: stobs stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the powers are emptiness.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the branches of awakening are emptiness.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the noble eightfold path is emptiness.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the noble truths are emptiness.

original: bsam gtan stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the meditative stabilizations are emptiness.

original: tshad med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the immeasurables should be known as emptiness;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the formless absorptions should be known as emptiness;

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the eight liberations should be known as emptiness;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the nine serial absorptions should be known as emptiness;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation should be known as emptiness;

original: mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the clairvoyances should be known as emptiness;

original: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the meditative stabilizations should be known as emptiness;

original: gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways should be known as emptiness;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the ten tathāgata powers should be known as emptiness;🔽the four fearlessnesses should be known as emptiness;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges should be known as emptiness;

original: byams pa chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know great love to be emptiness.

original: snying rje chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know great compassion to be emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras @47a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras @47a *//
translated: One should know the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas to be emptiness.

original: bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know the result of stream enterer to be emptiness.🔽One should know the result of once-returner to be emptiness.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know the result of non-returner to be emptiness.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know the state of a worthy one to be emptiness.

original: rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know a pratyekabuddha’s awakening to be emptiness.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know the knowledge of path aspects to be emptiness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know the knowledge of all aspects to be emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know a buddhafield to be emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the Buddha should be known as emptiness,

original: byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: and the bodhisattva should be known as emptiness.

original: rab 'byor / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston to //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston to //
translated: “Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom see all those dharmas as empty, they teach the Dharma to sentient beings who have gone wrong.

original: ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la'ang mi 'jug pa de ltar ston to //
analyzed: ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la'ang mi 'jug pa de ltar ston to //
translated: They teach it in such a way that they do not engage with those emptinesses.

original: des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te /
analyzed: des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te /
translated: Seeing in that way, they know all dharmas to be without obscurations.

original: chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: They do not disturb any dharma.

original: gnyis su mi byed do //
analyzed: gnyis su mi byed do //
translated: They do not make it dual.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du'ang ston pa byed do //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du'ang ston pa byed do //
translated: They teach it as it is in reality.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni /
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni /
translated: an emanation of the Tathāgata

original: sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor /
analyzed: sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor /
translated: They emanate many millions of emanations and connect some sentient beings to the perfection of generosity.

original: la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor /🔽la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor /
analyzed: la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor / la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor /
translated: They connect some to the perfection of ethical discipline.🔽They connect some to the perfection of patience.

original: la @47b la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor /
analyzed: la @47b la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor /
translated: They connect some to the perfection of joyous perseverance.

original: la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor /
analyzed: la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor /
translated: They connect some to the perfection of meditative stabilization.

original: la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor /
analyzed: la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor /
translated: They connect some to the perfection of wisdom.

original: la la bsam gtan bzhi la sbyor /
analyzed: la la bsam gtan bzhi la sbyor /
translated: They connect some to the four meditative stabilizations.

original: la la tshad med pa bzhi la sbyor /🔽la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor /
analyzed: la la tshad med pa bzhi la sbyor / la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor /
translated: They connect some to the four immeasurables.🔽They connect some to the four formless meditative stabilizations.

original: la la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyor /
analyzed: la la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyor /
translated: They connect some to the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: la la yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyor /
analyzed: la la yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyor /
translated: They connect some to the four perfect abandonings.

original: la la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyor /🔽la la dbang po lnga la sbyor /
analyzed: la la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyor / la la dbang po lnga la sbyor /
translated: They connect some to the four legs of manifestation.🔽They connect some to the five powers.

original: la la stobs lnga la sbyor /
analyzed: la la stobs lnga la sbyor /
translated: They connect some to the five forces.

original: la la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyor /
analyzed: la la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyor /
translated: some to the seven branches of enlightenment;

original: la la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor /
analyzed: la la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor /
translated: some to the noble eightfold path;

original: la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sbyor /
analyzed: la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sbyor /
translated: some to the four noble truths;

original: la la rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyor /
analyzed: la la rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyor /
translated: some to the eight liberations;

original: la la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor /
analyzed: la la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor /
translated: some to the nine serial steps of meditative absorption;

original: la la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyor /
analyzed: la la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyor /
translated: some to the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation;

original: la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor /
analyzed: la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor /
translated: some to the five powers;

original: la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sbyor /
analyzed: la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sbyor /
translated: some to all the meditative stabilities;🔽some to all the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor; la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor /
analyzed: la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor; la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor /
translated: some to the ten powers of the tathāgatas;

original: la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyor /
analyzed: la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyor /
translated: some to the four assurances;

original: la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor /🔽la la byams pa chen po la sbyor /
analyzed: la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor / la la byams pa chen po la sbyor /
translated: some to the four kinds of exact knowledge;🔽some to great loving kindness;

original: la la snying rje chen po la sbyor /
analyzed: la la snying rje chen po la sbyor /
translated: and some to great compassion.

original: la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor /
analyzed: la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor /
translated: some to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor /
analyzed: la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor /
translated: some to the result of stream enterer,

original: la la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor /🔽la la @48a *//
analyzed: la la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor / la la @48a *//
translated: some to the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor /🔽la la dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor / la la dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor /
translated: some to the result of non-returner,🔽some to the state of a worthy one,

original: la la rang byang chub la sbyor /
analyzed: la la rang byang chub la sbyor /
translated: some to a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: la la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la sbyor /
analyzed: la la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la sbyor /
translated: some to the knowledge of path aspects,

original: la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sbyor na /
analyzed: la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sbyor na /
translated: and some to the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rab 'byor / de la ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam /🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Is there any dharma that the emanation has differentiated?”

original: de ni / ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni / ma lags so //
translated: He replied, “No, Lord.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom

original: sems can rnams la chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can rnams la chos ston te /
translated: they teach the doctrine to sentient beings,

original: de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du /
analyzed: de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du /
translated: having freed them from their errors,🔽he establishes them in the perfect, just as it is,

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do //
translated: in a way that is neither bound nor freed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rab 'byor / de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni /
translated: Subhūti, it is because

original: 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba / tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: form is neither bound nor freed;🔽feeling is neither bound nor freed;

original: 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: perception is neither bound nor freed;

original: 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: volitional factors are neither bound nor freed;🔽consciousness is neither bound nor freed;

original: rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba; mig ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba; mig ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the eyes are neither bound nor freed;

original: rna ba ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽sna ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rna ba ma bcings ma grol ba / sna ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the ears are neither bound nor freed;🔽the nose is neither bound nor freed;

original: lce ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: lce ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the tongue is neither bound nor freed;

original: lus ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: lus ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the body is neither bound nor freed;

original: yid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: yid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the mind is neither bound nor freed;

original: gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: forms are neither bound nor freed;

original: sgra ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽dri ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽ro ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: sgra ma bcings ma grol ba / dri ma bcings ma grol ba / ro ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: sounds are neither bound nor freed;🔽smells are neither bound nor freed;🔽tastes are neither bound nor freed;

original: reg ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: reg ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: tactile objects are neither bound nor freed;

original: chos ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: chos ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: phenomena are neither bound nor freed;

original: mig gi @48b rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: mig gi @48b rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: eye consciousness is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba / sna'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: ear consciousness is neither fettered nor liberated,🔽nose consciousness is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: tongue consciousness is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: body consciousness is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: and mind consciousness is neither fettered nor liberated.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba; sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba; sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: Eye contact is neither fettered nor liberated,🔽ear contact is neither fettered nor liberated,🔽nose contact is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: tongue contact is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: body contact is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: and mind contact is neither fettered nor liberated.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is neither fettered nor liberated,🔽and

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose and contact is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue and contact is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of body and contact is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: and the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of mind and contact is neither fettered nor liberated.

original: sa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: sa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: The earth element is neither fettered nor liberated.

original: chu'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: chu'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: The water element is neither fettered nor liberated.

original: me'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽rlung gi khams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: me'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba / rlung gi khams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: The fire element is neither fettered nor liberated.🔽The wind element is neither fettered nor liberated.

original: nam mkha'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba / rnam par shes pa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: The space element is neither fettered nor liberated.🔽The consciousness element is neither fettered nor liberated.

original: ma rig pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: ma rig pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: Ignorance is neither fettered nor liberated.

original: 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: Conditioned action is neither fettered nor liberated.

original: rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: Consciousness is neither fettered nor liberated.

original: @49a *// ming dang gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: @49a *// ming dang gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: Name and form are neither fettered nor liberated.

original: skye mched drug ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: skye mched drug ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: The six sense sources are neither fettered nor liberated.

original: reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: contact is neither bound nor liberated,

original: tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽sred pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba / sred pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: feeling is neither bound nor liberated,🔽craving is neither bound nor liberated,

original: len pa ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽srid pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: len pa ma bcings ma grol ba / srid pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: grasping is neither bound nor liberated,🔽becoming is neither bound nor liberated,

original: skye ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: skye ba ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: birth is neither bound nor liberated,

original: rga shi ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rga shi ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: and aging and death are neither bound nor liberated.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: The perfection of generosity is neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: The perfection of ethical discipline is neither bound nor liberated.🔽The perfection of patience is neither bound nor liberated.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: The perfection of perseverance is neither bound nor liberated.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: The perfection of concentration is neither bound nor liberated.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba / nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba / phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is neither bound nor liberated.🔽Inner emptiness is neither bound nor liberated.🔽Outer emptiness is neither bound nor liberated.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is neither bound nor liberated.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness is not bound and is not freed,

original: chen po stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of great extent is not bound and is not freed,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality is not bound and is not freed,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not bound and is not freed,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽mtha' las 'dras pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba / mtha' las 'dras pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is not bound and is not freed,🔽the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not bound and is not freed,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not bound and is not freed,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is not bound and is not freed,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence is not bound and is not freed,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma bcings @49b ma grol ba /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma bcings @49b ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena is not bound and is not freed,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not bound and is not freed,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of nonobservation is not bound and is not freed,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of the absence of intrinsic nature is not bound and is not freed,🔽and the emptiness of the absence of anything to be emptied is not bound and is not freed.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature is not bound and is not freed,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not bound and is not freed,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the applications of mindfulness are not bound and are not freed,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the right efforts are not bound and are not freed,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽dbang po rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba / dbang po rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the legs of miraculous power are not bound and are not freed,🔽the faculties are not bound and are not freed,

original: stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the powers are not bound and are not freed,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the branches of awakening are not bound and are not freed,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the noble eightfold path is not bound and is not freed,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the noble truths are not bound and are not freed,

original: bsam gtan rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the meditative stabilities are not bound and are not freed,

original: tshad med pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the immeasurable aspirations are not bound and are not freed,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the formless absorptions are not bound and are not freed,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the liberations are not bound and are not freed,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the nine serial absorptions are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the clairvoyances are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the meditative stabilizations are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma @50a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma bcings ma grol ba / mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma @50a *//
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the four fearlessnesses are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba /🔽byams pa chen po ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba / byams pa chen po ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges are neither fettered nor liberated,🔽great love is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: snying rje chen po ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: great compassion is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are neither fettered nor liberated.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: The result of stream enterer is neither fettered nor liberated,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the result of once-returner is not bound and is not freed,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the result of non-returner is not bound and is not freed,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the state of a worthy one is not bound and is not freed,

original: rang byang chub ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rang byang chub ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is not bound and is not freed,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: the knowledge of path aspects is not bound and is not freed,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is not bound and is not freed.

original: gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no //🔽tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no // tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of form is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of feeling is not bound and is not freed.

original: 'du shes kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of perception is not bound and is not freed.

original: 'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of volitional factors is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of consciousness is not bound and is not freed.

original: rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the eyes is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of the ears is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of the nose is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of the tongue is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of the body is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of the thinking mind is not bound and is not freed.

original: mig gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mig ma yin no //🔽rna ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba ma yin no //🔽sna'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mig ma yin no // rna ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba ma yin no // sna'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna ma yin no //
translated: That which is not bound and not freed is not the eye.🔽That which is not bound and not freed is not the ear.🔽That which is not bound and not freed is not the nose.

original: lce'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce ma yin no //
translated: That which is not bound and not freed is not the tongue.

original: lus kyi @50b ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi @50b ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus ma yin no //
translated: That which is not bound and not freed is not the body.

original: yid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid ma yin no //
translated: That which is not bound and not freed is not the mind.

original: gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no //
translated: That which is not bound and not freed is not a form.

original: sgra'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no //🔽dri'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dri ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no // dri'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dri ma yin no //
translated: That which is not bound and not freed is not a sound.🔽That which is not bound and not freed is not a smell.

original: ro'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ro ma yin no //
analyzed: ro'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ro ma yin no //
translated: That which is not bound and not freed is not a taste.

original: reg gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de reg ma yin no //
analyzed: reg gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de reg ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of contact is not contact.

original: chos kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of mental phenomena is not mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of eye consciousness is not eye consciousness.🔽The unfettered and unbound nature of ear consciousness is not ear consciousness.🔽The unfettered and unbound nature of nose consciousness is not nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of tongue consciousness is not tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of body consciousness is not body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of the mind consciousness is not the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //🔽rna ba'i 'dus @51a *//
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no // rna ba'i 'dus @51a *//
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of eye contact is not eye contact.

original: te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
analyzed: te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of ear contact is not ear contact.🔽The unfettered and unbound nature of nose contact is not nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of tongue contact is not tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of body contact is not body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of the mind’s contact is not the mind’s contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is not the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is not the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is not the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact is not the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.🔽The non-bondage, non-liberation of the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact is not the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the dominant condition is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of the effect condition is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of the causal condition is not the causal condition.

original: yid kyi @51b 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi @51b 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the immediately preceding condition is not the immediately preceding condition.

original: sa'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the dominant condition is not the dominant condition.🔽The suchness of the effect condition is not the effect condition.🔽The suchness of the causal condition is not the causal condition.🔽The suchness of the immediately preceding condition is not the immediately preceding condition.🔽The suchness of the dominant condition is not the dominant condition.🔽The suchness of the effect condition is not the effect condition.🔽The suchness of the causal condition is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of the immediately preceding condition is not bound and is not freed.

original: chu'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chu'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chu'i khams ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the dominant condition is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of the effect condition is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of the causal condition is not the causal condition.🔽The suchness of the immediately preceding condition is not the immediately preceding condition.🔽The suchness of the dominant condition is not the dominant condition.🔽The suchness of the effect condition is not the effect condition.🔽The suchness of the causal condition is not the causal condition.

original: me'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de me'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de me'i khams ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the immediately preceding condition is not the immediately preceding condition.🔽The suchness of the dominant condition is not the dominant condition.🔽The suchness of the effect condition is not the effect condition.🔽The suchness of the causal condition is not bound and is not freed.🔽The suchness of the immediately preceding condition is not bound and is not freed.

original: rlung gi khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the dominant condition is not bound
